skills.name: TERRIBLE HAIL
desc: • Deals 4 hits of random damage to all enemies.
• 75% Chance to inflict 1 Mark per hit on each enemy for 2 turns.
• 25% Chance to Freeze each enemy for 1 turn.

skills.name: FROZEN FLESH
desc: • Deals 4 hits of random damage to a single target.
• Inflict Smite, Perfect Silence, and Permadeath on the target for 3 turns.
• Freeze enemies for the duration of battle and Heal all allies based on your MAX HP if the target is currently frozen.

skills.name: WINTER SOLDIER
desc: Remove Immunity and inflict Freeze on a random enemy for 1 turn at the start of your turn every turn.
